name: 耿繼業
objective:
A、光波(Optical Wave)
B、干涉(Interference)
C、繞射(Diffraction)
schedule:
第一週~第四週
A、光波(Optical Wave)
a、以函數表示光波(Optical Wave is Represented by Mathematical Function)
b、波函數的物理意義(Physical Meaning of Wave Function)
c、複數波(Complex Representation)
d、光強度(Optical Intensity)
e、波的疊加(The Superposition of Wave)
B、干涉(Interference)
第五週~第七週
a、基本干涉原理(Basic Principle of Interference)
b、干涉條件(Conditions for Interference)
c、楊氏雙狹縫干涉(Young's Double Slit Interference)
d、干涉條紋的可見度 (Visibility of the Fringes)
第八週~第十一週
e、薄膜干涉的基本原理(Basic Theory of Thin Film Interfernce)
f、牛頓環及光楔干涉(Newton's Ring and Wedge Interference)
第十二週~第十四週
g、邁克森干涉儀(Michelson Interferometer)
h、多束光干涉(Multiple-Beam Interference)
i、多束光干涉系統鑑別率分析(Resolution of Multiple-Beam Interference System)
第十五週~第十七週
C、繞射(Diffraction)
a、惠更斯定理(Huygens's Principle)
b、繞射基本原理(Basic Theory of Diffraction)
c、狹縫繞射(Slit Diffraction)
d、光柵繞射(Grating Diffraction)
e、瑞雷判別準則(Rayleigh's Criterion)
f、光柵系統之鑑別率 (Resolving Power of Grating System)
g、圓孔繞射(Diffraction by Circular Aperture)
scorePolicy:
1、成績為小考 、期中考、期末考平均得之(Point scale is based on the average of midterm and semester    test, and some quizzes)
2、作業、出席率為調整總成績之參考(Final score will be modified by homework and class attendance)
